LanguageData.HaulExplicitly.SetUnhaulableDesc: Your colonists will leave this item where it is-- unless it is needed imminently, or you explicitly create a job to haul it somewhere.
LanguageData.HaulExplicitly.SetHaulableDesc: Your colonists will freely haul this item to any suitable stockpile
LanguageData.HaulExplicitly.HaulExplicitlyDesc: Designate a specific location where the item will be hauled to. From there, it will no longer be hauled until you make it haulable again.
LanguageData.HaulExplicitly.CancelHaulExplicitlyDesc: The item will no longer be hauled to the destination you previously designated.
LanguageData.HaulExplicitly.SelectAllHaulExplicitlyDe: Select every item that is a part of the same hauling job as this item.
LanguageData.HaulExplicitly.AutoForbiddenAfterHaulExp: Auto Forbidden after Haul to destination
